channel.title: Delete items

item.title: Delete items
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

well i created teleport tabs but when i click them it deletes them all except for one heres my code

if (itemId == 8013) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(3082, 3246, 0);
c.getItems().deleteItem(8013, 1);
}

how would i fix it to only remove one tele tab?

Read full topic
